test.query: SELECT tokens(URL) FROM hits_10m_single FORMAT Null
SELECT tokens(URL, 'ngrams', 3) FROM hits_10m_single FORMAT Null
SELECT tokens(URL, 'splitByString', ['/', '.', ':']) FROM hits_10m_single FORMAT Null
SELECT tokens(URL, 'array') FROM hits_10m_single FORMAT Null
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE hasAllTokens(URL, ['market'])
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE hasAllTokens(URL, ['market', 'video', 'com'])
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE hasAnyTokens(URL, ['market'])
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE hasAnyTokens(URL, ['market', 'video', 'com'])
